description: Defines data entity classes for a CRM mobile application, representing contacts, deals, tasks, and notes with Room database annotations.

classes.name: Contact
classes.description: Represents a contact entity with id, name, email, and phone fields.

classes.name: Deal
classes.description: Represents a deal entity with id, title, value, and associated contact.

classes.name: Task
classes.description: Represents a task entity with id, title, status, and associated contact and deal.

classes.name: Note
classes.description: Represents a note entity linked to either a contact or a deal, with content.
